description: This Dart source file defines an abstract repository interface for managing notes, along with an in-memory implementation suitable for testing and initial UI development. It includes methods for fetching, inserting, updating, and deleting notes, and references external classes such as Note and NoteFactory.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: An abstract interface for note management, supporting fetching, inserting, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: An in-memory implementation of NoteRepository, useful for early development and testing, managing notes within a list.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Fetches all notes, optionally ordering pinned notes first.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note and returns the created note with assigned id.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note and returns the updated instance.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id.
